00022 /*! dcovector*double operator */
00023 inline _dcovector operator*(const dcovector& vec, const double& d)
00024 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00025   dcovector newvec(vec.l);
00026   for(long i=0; i<vec.l; i++){ newvec.array[i] =vec.array[i]*d; }
00027   
00028   return _(newvec);
00029 }
